languages.text: "Для начала — осмотреться и выяснить, почему прибытие {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} не вызвало обычного переполоха. Говоря прямо — на данном этапе я бы не рассчитывал на теплый прием. Лучше держать оружие наготове".

traits.locale_text: "Для начала — осмотреться и выяснить, почему прибытие {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} не вызвало обычного переполоха. Говоря прямо — на данном этапе я бы не рассчитывал на теплый прием. Лучше держать оружие наготове".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."
languages.original_text: "Для начала — осмотреться и выяснить, почему прибытие {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} не вызвало обычного переполоха. Говоря прямо — на данном этапе я бы не рассчитывал на теплый прием. Лучше держать оружие наготове".

traits.locale_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the Rogue Trader did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the Rogue Trader did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我们首先可以看一下周围的情况，弄清楚为什么{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的到来没有引起惯常的骚动。老实说，在这种情况下，我觉得恐怕不会有什么热烈的欢迎仪式，你最好提前把武器准备好。”
languages.original_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."

traits.locale_text: “我们首先可以看一下周围的情况，弄清楚为什么{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的到来没有引起惯常的骚动。老实说，在这种情况下，我觉得恐怕不会有什么热烈的欢迎仪式，你最好提前把武器准备好。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Lo primero es estudiar nuestros alrededores y descubrir por qué la llegada de un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} no ha generado el ajetreo habitual. Para ser franco, a estas alturas no cuento con una cálida bienvenida. Será mejor que tenga su arma preparada».
languages.original_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."

traits.locale_text: «Lo primero es estudiar nuestros alrededores y descubrir por qué la llegada de un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} no ha generado el ajetreo habitual. Para ser franco, a estas alturas no cuento con una cálida bienvenida. Será mejor que tenga su arma preparada».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「まず手始めに、なぜ{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の到着がいつものような騒動にならなかったのか、その理由を探ってみましょう。はっきり言って、このままではあたたかい歓迎は期待できません。武器を準備しておいたほうがいいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."

traits.locale_text: 「まず手始めに、なぜ{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の到着がいつものような騒動にならなかったのか、その理由を探ってみましょう。はっきり言って、このままではあたたかい歓迎は期待できません。武器を準備しておいたほうがいいでしょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir sollten uns zuerst einmal umsehen und herausfinden, warum die Ankunft {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g} nicht die übliche Aufregung zur Folge hatte. Offen gestanden würde ich aktuell nicht mit einer herzlichen Begrüßung rechnen. Haltet besser Eure Waffe bereit."
languages.original_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten uns zuerst einmal umsehen und herausfinden, warum die Ankunft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nicht die übliche Aufregung zur Folge hatte. Offen gestanden würde ich aktuell nicht mit einer herzlichen Begrüßung rechnen. Haltet besser Eure Waffe bereit."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Commençons par inspecter les lieux afin de découvrir pourquoi l'arrivée {mf|du|de la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ne suscite pas le tumulte escompté. À ce stade, je doute que nous puissions nous attendre à un accueil chaleureux. Mieux vaut vous tenir {mf|prêt|prête} à dégainer votre arme. »
languages.original_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."

traits.locale_text: « Commençons par inspecter les lieux afin de découvrir pourquoi l'arrivée {mf|du|de la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ne suscite pas le tumulte escompté. À ce stade, je doute que nous puissions nous attendre à un accueil chaleureux. Mieux vaut vous tenir {mf|prêt|prête} à dégainer votre arme. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "İlk olarak {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} teşrif ettiğinde neden yaygara kopmadığını tespit etmek için çevreyi incelemeli. Demem o ki sıcakkanlı bir karşılama beklememek gerekir. Elin silahında olsun."
languages.original_text: "To start, let's look around and find out why the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} did not elicit the usual fuss. To speak plainly, I would not count on a warm welcome at this rate. Better keep your weapon at the ready."

traits.locale_text: “İlk olarak {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}’in teşrifiyle daima çıkan yaygaranın burada neden çıkmadığını tespit etmek için çevreyi incelemeli. Demem o ki sıcakkanlı bir karşılama beklememek gerekir. Elin silahında olsun.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
